website_summaries.verdict: These towelettes get good reviews from customers with sensitive skin. However, the multipack packaging of this brand means there's a risk that they will dry out.
pros: Facial cleansing and makeup removing micellar water wipes
Don't burn the skin or eyes
For sensitive or allergy prone skin
cons: Some say it was not an effective eye makeup remover

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like the bioderma bottled cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Did not get makeup off at all. I live by the bioderma bottled cleanser and would recommend in a heartbeat, but this one did not hit the nail on the head. It mostly smeared makeup around my face and I had to scrub really hard for it to work. Nope nope.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Potter

customer_reviews.title: Alright
customer_reviews.text: These are nice but probably not a great value. The wipes are a little dry if you ask me. If you're really dead-set on bioderma facewipes, get the 60 count pack of the ABCDerm ones, I think the value is better and those feel a bit more moist. This packaging is an insanely beautiful, fluorescent magenta color that makes me happy, and that is the only reason I would ever consider repurchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: Mon

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: This is garbage. I love the bioderma micellar water and I thought by buying these it would be very similar. Holy hell was I wrong. They’re not moist towelettes at all. As soon as you get one swipe across your face it’s completely dried out. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: cheaptrick

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: These are okay. I have sensitive skin so the formula is good but the wipes feel a little dry/not well saturated and the texture is a little rough. I feel like I have to tug at my skin to really get all the makeup off. Not the worst thing I've ever used but I think you could find something better for less $$$.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Lazy Days, Travel, Camping
customer_reviews.text: My regular routine involves the BioDerma Micellar Water, but when I'm just too lazy and sleepy to do my full multi-step nighttime routine, these are perfect to keep by my bed alongside a tube of Embryolisse Lait Creme Concentre for a quick, bare-bones clean/moisturize routine. If you have heavy foundation applied and/or a crazy amount of eye makeup, these might not cut it and you should really just wash your face. For tinted moisturizer and light eye makeup, you'll be good to go - no more messed up pillowcases!
customer_reviews.author: J Jones

customer_reviews.title: Thoroughly & gently removes makeup!
customer_reviews.text: These Sensibio wipes are by far the Bestt and least expensive make up remover wipes I've ever used, and I've purchased many, many make up remover products over the years. So glad I decided to give these a try. Very gentle while also very thoroughly removing heavy mascara, foundation, etc. Will use forever!
customer_reviews.author: ginnywolff

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Clean like it says
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product based on reviews & was very disappointed in how it worked. I had on a light foundation - used the wipes to remove my makeup, actually used 2 of them. I then didn't feel like my face was clean so I used a cotton disc and cleansing water and was very surprised & disappointed to see the foundation on the cotton discs - this should have been removed using these wipes. I will be throwing out the rest of them because they are useless.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: No sting or burn!
customer_reviews.text: My dermatologist suggest I get these and they have been my favorite facial cleaner wipes I’ve ever used. No sting or burn and my face feels so clean after! Love how quickly it removes makeup!
customer_reviews.author: Healthy Oiling Mama

customer_reviews.title: Great product if package would stay closed
customer_reviews.text: The product is great but the packaging doesn't allow for it to stay closed properly, so the product dries. I would suggest transferring to a zip lock baggie to avoid this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Leaves your skin feeling clean
customer_reviews.text: I do appreciate how well these clean makeup off my face- they were recommended by a dermatologist. I do find that the makeup remover towels (the just add water) work a little faster for eye makeup but if you were on an airplane or traveling these are handy. I like using both because it makes my skin feel very clean.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Not moist enough
customer_reviews.text: I usually just soak my own face pads and put in a baggie for travel so I was excited when I saw this travel pack. It was a huge let down. The wipes are rough on the face and have hardly any product on them leaving them somewhat moist but not enough to remove the makeup without harshly rubbing the skin. I threw these away after my trip and resumed soaking some face pads with the solution and leaving them in a baggie for travel. Huge let down for me.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Prefer these to Neutrogena!
customer_reviews.text: When I lived in Paris for a month, I couldn’t find the Neutrogena brand, so I tried these, and loved them! So happy to find them here on Amazon. Better texture, my face felt cleaner and the fragrance was fresher.
customer_reviews.author: 6-StringAcoustic

customer_reviews.title: Wish these were a lot more saturated
customer_reviews.text: This product works pretty well, however I feel that it needs more of the Bioderma solution on the wipes. If you're used to using the Neutrogena makeup wipes you may not be happy about how "dry" these are. I wish I had an extra bottle of Bioderma to fully saturate the wipes. Will only purchase this again for travel but not for a day to day basis
customer_reviews.author: Alina

customer_reviews.title: Love Bioderma products but this one wasn't amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love Bioderma products but this one wasn't amazing. The wipes work pretty well to remove makeup and don't irritate my eyes like others but they are quite dry. I wish they had more liquid in them. One thing I like is that the packaging really closes well so the wipes don't dry out after some time like others do.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Fluin

customer_reviews.title: Not sure
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what's going on with these. They don't seem to get my eye makeup off great. I thought it might be because they are a little dry.. So then I added more of the Bioderma liquid I have in a bottle and that helped but. Meh, don't think I'll order again.
customer_reviews.author: ekogirl

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I use these wipes daily and find them effective and refreshing. I originally purchased because they are biodegradable but now love them for their use as well. Have recommended these to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Grecat

customer_reviews.title: Works magically for acne-better than prescribed ones-Delivered super fast
customer_reviews.text: Delivered so fast. This is an AMAZING product. My aunt brought it for me from France and it just wiped out my acne’s in a few days. Had tried many many many products before including the prescription ointments. Nothing works as well as this one. Well worth the money. I am so happy that Amazon caries it.
customer_reviews.author: Nesa Khalilidadoei

customer_reviews.title: Great in a pinch
customer_reviews.text: These are great in a pinch but I quit using them after reading that they are not effective in removing all your make up. And that make up needs to come off before you go to bed.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Gay Norris

customer_reviews.title: Very gentle
customer_reviews.text: These are so good on my sensitive and acne prone skin. A little tough to get off eye make up but good for the other parts of the face. Smells really fresh and clean and i dont feel like i have to re moisturize after using it. Which is a huge bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea D.

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: They are great for removing facial makeup. For eye makeup they take off some but not all. I have very sensitive skin and they don't irritate. I use the product from the bottle at home, these when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Hollywood South

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for contact lens wearers
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of bioderma liquid, and as a contact lens wearer, I struggle to find wipes that don’t irritate my eyes. These get most mascaras off, while not irritating my eyes or pulling out my lashes. Glad for the auto delivery function!
customer_reviews.author: Techguru

customer_reviews.title: Gentle on  the skin
customer_reviews.text: Daughter has problematic skin and she says she loves these wipes, no burning and all her make up comes off easily.
customer_reviews.author: Julie M. Jelaco

customer_reviews.title: Funny Smell
customer_reviews.text: I use Bioderma micellar water on a regular basis and bought these wipes for travel. The package leaked and my boyfriend agrees that these kind of stink.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy Joe

customer_reviews.title: Better options out there
customer_reviews.text: Wipes are on the dry side, like they are old maybe. I need two, and my face still doesn’t feel clean. Also dries my skin out.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Finley

customer_reviews.title: get the liquid in the bottle for great results.
customer_reviews.text: It's kind of dry... get the liquid in the bottle for great results.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Palomino

customer_reviews.title: ... Bioderma wipes before when I visited France and I loved them, but these just smell a bit off ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used the Bioderma wipes before when I visited France and I loved them, but these just smell a bit off and are pretty pricey. Won’t be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Estefania

customer_reviews.title: A little dry
customer_reviews.text: I know this product in liquid form is great, but these wipes didn't have enough of it on them to be super effective.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha L.

customer_reviews.title: Works as said
customer_reviews.text: They are awesome they work as said and the thickness is great.
customer_reviews.author: Beautiful22

customer_reviews.title: The Best Wipes
customer_reviews.text: The best cleansing wipes I’ve ever tried. Just the best.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Simon

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, but it think they are cheaper options same results
customer_reviews.author: Alma L.

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product. Does not clean face well. Cloths are too dry. I bought bioderma liquid and it was great! Hoped this would be as well. Not so.
customer_reviews.author: MRR

customer_reviews.title: The wipes also dry REALLY fast making it not so great when I need to get eye make up off
customer_reviews.text: They make my face feel really oily and causes me to break out. The wipes also dry REALLY fast making it not so great when I need to get eye make up off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for your skin
customer_reviews.text: I love these because they don't dry your face out but they also don't leave it feeling greasy. I never wake up with acne when I use this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi V

customer_reviews.title: My favorite for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Great for travel and gets all my makeup off even the 27 layers of mascara
customer_reviews.author: Denise Maralian

customer_reviews.title: Great for my sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have used up the entire pack and I’m on to my second on. I have very sensitive skin and have. It had any issues or breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Great product, scent and makes skin refreshed
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I had first tried it when the micellar water came in my Birchbox and I used up the sample within a week so I bought these wipes! That was in October and I just ran out (I also have other cleaners and wipes that I switch between). I loveee the light scent - I'm not good at describing but it's delicious! I want to try the type for combination skin but I'm worried it won't have the same scent that I love! If anyone knows the answer, please enlighten me! All in all, amazing product, leaves skin refreshed, delicious,light scent!
customer_reviews.author: ANPortie

customer_reviews.title: Makes it Easy
customer_reviews.text: Swiping my face instead of washing is perfect for late-night bedtime!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole or Scott

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the real solution
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't remove eye makeup as well as cotton with the actually bioderma sensibio solution. Bought it for traveling purposes but it was a mistake. Might as well bring solution in 3oz bottle and some cotton pads with you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wipes that don’t leave oily residue!
customer_reviews.text: Great French brand wipes (or comes in liquid form) that remove makeup entirely and doesn’t leave gross film on skin. ZERO eye irritation. Could be a tad more saturated with solution.
customer_reviews.author: Kali Jaeger

customer_reviews.title: ... more as the cleaning power of these pads are amazing. My skin has never looked so good
customer_reviews.text: I bought more as the cleaning power of these pads are amazing. My skin has never looked so good.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Markus

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Does a terrible job of removing my make up. When you take your mascara off it leaves you with raccoon eyes and you have to scrub to get the make up off from under your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: KARRI J.

customer_reviews.title: My daily routine
customer_reviews.text: Great for cleaning makeup off , love the convenience of a wipe with MW that is good for your skin, not oily or drying to your face.
customer_reviews.author: JettSetter22

customer_reviews.title: Not soft enough.
customer_reviews.text: I find these not very soft. Not good for sensitive skin as a result.
customer_reviews.author: Mystic Falls

customer_reviews.title: Stay away if you have super sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I oved the idea of these for convenience and have like most of the micellar product I've tried. This in stripped my face of all my natural oils and eventually caused a sensitive meltdown
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and good for travel
customer_reviews.text: Gentle and effective but no replacement for the real deal Bioderma micellar water. Great for the airplane or travel in general.
customer_reviews.author: tynitown

customer_reviews.title: These are great. I have very sensitive skin and they do ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I have very sensitive skin and they do not irritate it at all. They are very soothing. There is no fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Only one pack, not two
customer_reviews.text: Wipes were dry on arrival and only one package came, not two, as listed.
customer_reviews.author: kittenclaws

customer_reviews.title: Does not remove makeup
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea how these are getting such good reviews - did not take my mascara off at all. It just smeared it. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennyb

customer_reviews.title: Love this makeup remover in its liquid form
customer_reviews.text: Love this makeup remover in its liquid form. These sheets are convenient for travel but don't seem to be quite as good as the liquid.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great cleansing pads. Clear your face, remove eye makeup, & refreshing
customer_reviews.author: Christina Borg

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: Worked OK. It was recommended on a beauty blog. Wouldn't order again. Not a big fan of how stiff the cloths are. I much prefer the softer & gentler Neutrogena ones. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: karmaqueen13

customer_reviews.title: It’s a no from me
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Hard to remove makeup. I don’t see how these would work for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: these are easy to use, and clean make up off ok.
customer_reviews.author: Lady

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t really remove makeup efficiently. Also not soft on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Cantor

customer_reviews.title: These don't really take off your makeup. Still need ...
customer_reviews.text: These don't really take off your makeup. Still need to use eye makeup remover after several wipes with these cloths.
customer_reviews.author: K in SF

customer_reviews.title: I bought these for my kit to travel with, ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my kit to travel with, but much prefer the regular liquid on a cotton pad. Somehow his was irritating for my skin?
customer_reviews.author: Bria Salvador-French

customer_reviews.title: Great for Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Refreshing to the face and does not burn. My 2 year Granddaughter love them too
customer_reviews.author: Alma H Torres

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I typically use the liquid version but was travelling and thought these would be better! As always, remvoes all my makeup and is gentle on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle J

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: very good for quick use. Think there should be more in each package tho
customer_reviews.author: cj

customer_reviews.title: Non-toxic!
customer_reviews.text: These take off makeup so well and are better for your skin than others.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Sumrall

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this makeup remover, makes my skin feel and smell so good and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Hess

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product is great this is my second purchase! Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: It’s me Celia

customer_reviews.title: Okay. Not amazing.
customer_reviews.text: These are good wipes, but they dry out quickly, so make sure you re-seal the package completely every time you use them, and try to use them all within a month after opening the package. They remove all my makeup without irritating my skin, but I don't feel very refreshed because, as I said, they seem a little dry. I prefer Yes to Cucumber wipes because they do the same thing, but I feel more refreshed, and they're readily available where I live (cheaper too!).
customer_reviews.author: Ebsa

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed in the facial wipes
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in the facial wipes. Did not clean my mascara off. I have Used other brands that I like much better. I would not reorder!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley W. Day

customer_reviews.title: It is good for travel because of very convenience
customer_reviews.text: It is good for travel because of very convenience. I have an eye allergy, it is no problem to my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: book lover

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: Great for travel. At home I use the one in the pump bottle. No dryness. No greasiness. So basically perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: I love this make up remover Super clean and without use ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this make up remover Super clean and without use cleanser
customer_reviews.author: MAY ZHANG

customer_reviews.title: I am obsessed with the Micelle Water from this brand ...
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with the Micelle Water from this brand; however, I don't think this product removed my make up as well.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Preston

customer_reviews.title: Been using for two years — my favorite — doesnr burn like others
customer_reviews.text: The best, I’ve used these for two years now. My friends come over or family visits, and each person who has borrowed a wile has commented that they feel like they don’t even have to wash her face! I feel like that too, but use their other product for that. These work for me, they don’t burn my skin or my eyes. Smell isn’t strong, but is soothing.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUserInNYC

product_meta.title: Bioderma - Sensibio H2O - Biodegradables Wipes - Cleansing and Make-Up Removing - Skin Soothing - for Sensitive Skin
